item.title: Blog
item.dc:creator: minicorp_ishyoboy
item.content:encoded:
[page_break style="padding: 20px 0;"][/page_break]
[content_break]
[section color="color2"]
[row]
[grid9]
[headline tag="h2" color="color1" align="left"]Are you impressed by Minicorp?[/headline]
[headline tag="h5" color="color4" align="left"]Any content can be placed in the page for posts! This comes particularly in handy if you wish to display banners or some short introduction texts. The field supports shortcodes, which means you can place any content you can imagine.[/headline]
[/grid9]
[grid3]
[slidable autoslide="yes" animation="fade" interval="2" navigation="no"]

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: minicorp_ishyoboy
item.content:encoded:
[divider] [headline tag="h1" lined="no" color="color1" align="center"]Minicorp, Premium WordPress theme[/headline] [divider] [row] [box_group] [one_fourth] [iconic_box icon="icon-cog" color="color2" align="center"] [headline tag="h3" color="color1"]Theme Options[/headline] Minicorp has an advanced back-end administration module which allows you to set and tune all theme settings to your needs. [button url="general-options/" size="small" color="color1" new_window="no"]Have a look![/button] [/iconic_box] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth] [iconic_box icon="icon-award" color="color1" align="center"] [headline tag="h3"]35+ Shortcodes[/headline] Minicorp comes with an outstanding set of shortcodes available to help you assemble the content just in seconds. Whether you are a developer or a newbie you will be able to make thousands of combinations. [/iconic_box] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth] [iconic_box icon="icon-star" color="color2" align="center"] [headline tag="h3" color="color4"]5 star support[/headline] No matter how experienced you are, there are times when a helping hand could come in handy. That's when we step in to cover your back! [button url="http://themeforest.net/user/IshYoBoy/portfolio?ref=IshYoBoy" size="small" color="color1" new_window="yes"]Help me![/button] [/iconic_box] [/one_fourth] [one_fourth] [iconic_box icon="icon-bookmark" color="color3" align="center"] [headline tag="h3" color="color1"]Hurry up![/headline] Bookmark this page now! Nowadays we browse through hundreds of pages. Ever happened to you that you've found a great webpage but can't remember anything you could use to search for? Well, bookmark it now! [/iconic_box] [/one_fourth] [/box_group] [/row] [divider] [content_break] [section] [headline tag="h2" lined="no" color="color2" align="center"]Fully Responsive and Retina ready![/headline] [/section] [/content_break] [row] [two_thirds] [section_headline tag="h4" lined="yes" color="color2"]Latest Blog posts[/section_headline] [recent_posts order="DESC" columns="2" count="6" show_title_icon="no" show_media="yes" show_date="yes" show_categories="yes" show_author="no" show_tags="no" show_comments="no" slideshow="yes" animation="slide" navigation="yes" autoslide="no" interval=""] [/two_thirds] [one_third] [section_headline tag="h4" lined="yes" color="color2"]User Testimonials[/section_headline] [slidable autoslide="yes" interval="3" navigation="yes" animation="fade"] [slide][quote color="color1"]Awesome! Thank you so much. I’m more than pleased with your theme and support.[author]Alex[/author][/quote][/slide] [slide][quote color="color2"]Very incredible. I’ll rate you five stars for sure. This theme is amazing! Five Stars!!![author]Andy[/author][/quote][/slide] [slide][quote color="color1"]Thanks so much. You guys are outstanding in every area – and that is so rare to find.[author]Dan[/author][/quote][/slide] [/slidable] [/one_third] [/row] [divider] [content_break] [section] [headline tag="h2" lined="no" color="color2" align="center"]With Woocommerce and WPML support![/headline] [/section] [/content_break] [section_headline tag="h4" lined="yes" color="color2"]Latest item in our portfolio[/section_headline] [row] [one_full] [portfolio order="DESC" navigation="no" pagination="no" view_all="no" height="167" per_page="4" columns="4" masonry="no"] [/one_full] [/row] [divider] [content_break] [section] [headline tag="h2" lined="no" color="color2" align="center"]Our main clients[/headline] [/section] [/content_break] [divider] [slidable autoslide="yes" animation="slide" interval="3" navigation="no"] [slide] [row] [one_sixth]

[/one_sixth] [one_sixth]

item.title: Shortcodes
item.dc:creator: minicorp_ishyoboy
item.content:encoded: [separator id="columns-shortcodes"] [headline tag="h2" color="color1" align="center"]Columns Shortcodes[/headline] [divider] [row] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-columns" size="30" color="color2" url="columns/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Columns[/headline] Basic elements for building thousands combinations of layouts. Default, advanced, predefined ... create whatever you can imagine. [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-columns" size="30" color="color2" url="columns/columns-nested/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Columns nested[/headline] Needed to create more complex layouts with nested columns? Not a problem. With Minicorp you can use 3 levels of nested columns - nested1, nested2, nested3. [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-minus-1" size="30" color="color2" url="divider-separator/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Divider & Separator[/headline] Make your content clear and more readable by defining white spaces with divider and separator shortcode. [/one_third] [/row] [separator id="typography-shortcodes"] [headline tag="h2" color="color1" align="center"]Typography Shortcodes[/headline] [divider] [row] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-font" size="30" color="color2" url="dropcaps/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Dropcaps[/headline] Highlight first character in first word inside paragraph, 2 styles, 4 colors, just to choose ... [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-text-width" size="30" color="color2" url="headlines/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Headlines[/headline] 6 sizes, 4 colors, lined, iconic, even text with style as headlines but you can define your own tags ... [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-heart" size="30" align="center" color="color2" url="icons/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3" align="center"]Icons[/headline] Want to use icons in your theme to emphasise something? Use one of 3 types of icon - default, square and circle - and choose from 1000+ icons included in Minicorp theme. [/one_third] [/row] [divider] [row] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-list-2" size="30" color="color2" url="lists/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Lists[/headline] Create 9 types of unordered list + ordered list and possibility to colorize their symbols ... [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-instapaper" size="30" color="color2" url="mark/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Mark[/headline] Want to highlight something important? Simply use mark shortcode ... [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-quote" size="30" color="color2" url="quote-pullquote/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Quote & Pullquote[/headline] Want to quote somebody or to write an interesting quote you have found? [/one_third] [/row] [separator id="block-shortcodes"] [headline tag="h2" color="color1" align="center"]Block Shortcodes[/headline] [divider] [row] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-indent-right-1" size="30" color="color2" url="accordion-toggle/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Accordion & Toggle[/headline] Accordion and toggle are perfectly suitable for FAQ sections. They generate accordion styled content areas which can contain various elements and shortcodes. [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-bullhorn" size="30" color="color2" url="alerts/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Alerts[/headline] Alert boxes can be used to display various messages on the site. Show information, warnings, errors interesting way. [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-th-large" size="30" color="color2" url="boxes/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Boxes[/headline] Wrap your content into boxes and make them more visible and catchy. Add icon, change align, change color, add buttons, whatever you want ... [/one_third] [/row] [divider] [row] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-pause-1" size="30" color="color2" url="boxes/box-group/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Box Group[/headline] Wrap your boxes with "box_group" shortcode and they will have the same height. [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-blank" size="30" color="color2" url="buttons/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Buttons[/headline] Create "Call to action", "Read more" and other different buttons with "button" shortcode. 3 sizes, 4 colors, many possible combination. [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-menu-1" size="30" color="color2" url="menu/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Menu[/headline] Use your dynamic Wordpress menu on any place - content, sidebars, footer ... [/one_third] [/row] [divider] [row] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-code" size="30" color="color2" url="pre-code/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Pre & Code[/headline] Need to display code in your content? Not a problem ... [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-align-left" size="30" color="color2" url="skills/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Skills[/headline] Show off your skills or create progress bars. Everything with eye-catching animation ... [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-table" size="30" color="color2" url="tables-pricing-tables/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Tables & Pricing Tables[/headline] Tables are perfectly suitable for displaying structured data. Whether regular tables or more advanced pricing tables, Minicorp has them covered. [/one_third] [/row] [divider] [row] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-th-list" size="30" color="color2" url="horizontal-vertical-tabs/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Tabs[/headline] Tabs come really in handy when more content needs to be displayed in a small area. Separate your content into several sections and display them in tabs. [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-comment-4" size="30" color="color2" url="tooltip/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Tooltip[/headline] Tooltip shortcode is the perfect way of adding hidden but important additional information to elements and text. [/one_third] [/row] [separator id="special-shortcodes"] [headline tag="h2" color="color1" align="center"]Special Shortcodes[/headline] [divider] [row] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-right-open-1" size="30" color="color2" url="breadcrumbs/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Breadcrumbs[/headline] Exactly what breadcrumbs do, show full path where you are currently in the page hierarchy. [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-chart-pie" size="30" align="center" color="color2" url="charts/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3" align="center"]Charts[/headline] Show off your progress with pie charts. Easy to use, easy to customize, easy to do whatever you want. [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-eq" size="30" color="color2" url="content-break-page-break//" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Content & Page break[/headline] Use content break shortcode to create important sections on any page, give them background or pattern. You can even split your page content to more parts with page break shortcode. [/one_third] [/row] [divider] [row] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-video-2" size="30" color="color2" url="embed-vimeo-youtube-soundcloud/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Embed & Multimedia[/headline] Embed provides the possibility to embed Video, Audio and Image content from third-party websites like Vimeo, YouTube, SoundCloud, Instagram, Flickr, etc... It's so easy! [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-map" size="30" color="color2" url="map/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Map[/headline] Use Google Maps shortcode to show and mark up to 10 important locations on a single map. Use the default layout or customize the look to better fit your design. [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-briefcase" size="30" color="color2" url="portfolio-shortcode/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Portfolio shortcode[/headline] Show off your portfolio with portfolio shortcode by customizing columns, height, layout, navigation. You can even create multiple portfolios on one page. [/one_third] [/row] [divider] [row] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-briefcase" size="30" color="color2" url="../portfolio/portfolio-detail-shortcode/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Portfolio Detail Shortcode[/headline] Show gallery of portfolio detail, show next / prev project buttons, show categories. Everything with predefined shortcodes. [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-article-alt-1" size="30" color="color2" url="recent-posts/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Recent Posts[/headline] Show recent posts from blog has never been easier. Change columns, headlines style, make autoslide slideshow ... [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-circle-empty" size="30" color="color2" url="rounded-image/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Rounded Image[/headline] Rounded image shortcode is an "update" of the regular images. There is no need to use advanced photo editing programs to create rounded image anymore. [/one_third] [/row] [divider] [row] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-easel" size="30" color="color2" url="slider-slidable/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Slider & Slidable[/headline] The built in IshYoBoy slider and the slidable shortcodes give you the opportunity to create great looking animations using all the content you already know. [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-share" size="30" color="color2" url="social-share/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Social Share[/headline] Want to use share functionality on your blog posts or pages? Insert your social share code in global settings and use it anywhere on whole page. [/one_third] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-text-width" size="30" color="color2" url="the-title/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]The Title[/headline] Show dynamic title of current page, make it as a headline, button, paragraph content ... [/one_third] [/row] [divider] [row] [one_third align="center"] [icon type="circle" icon="icon-address" size="30" color="color2" url="timeline/" new_window="no"] [headline tag="h3"]Timeline[/headline] Perfectly suitable for displaying projects' timelines, checkpoints, and goals structured in chronological order. Of course, very customisable as usual. [/one_third] [/row] [divider]

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
[headline tag="h1" color="color1"][the_title][/headline]
[headline tag="h2"]Minicorp comes with an outstanding set of more than 35 shortcodes available to help you assemble the content just in seconds. Whether you are a developer or a newbie you will be able to make thousands of combinations.[/headline]

Minicorp comes with an outstanding set of shortcodes available to help you assemble the content just in seconds. Whether you are a developer or a newbie you will be able to make thousands of combinations.
shortcode, shortcodes, wordpress, theme, widgets shortcode, corporate shortcodes

item.title: Boxes
item.dc:creator: minicorp_ishyoboy
item.content:encoded:
[section_headline tag="h4" lined="yes"]Default[/section_headline]
[row]
[one_half][box color="" icon="" align="left"]Box content[/box][/one_half]
[one_half][pre][[box color="" icon="" align="left"] ... [/box]][/pre][/one_half]
[/row]
[divider]
[row]
[one_half][box color="color1" icon="" align="center"]Box content[/box][/one_half]
[one_half][pre][[box color="color1" icon="" align="center"] ... [/box]][/pre][/one_half]
[/row]
[divider]
[row]
[one_half][box color="color3" icon="" align="right"]Box content[/box][/one_half]
[one_half][pre][[box color="color3" icon="" align="right"] ... [/box]][/pre][/one_half]
[/row]

item.title: 404 Not Found
item.dc:creator: minicorp_ishyoboy
item.content:encoded: [divider] [row] [one_third][/one_third] [two_thirds] [headline tag="h3" color="color2" lined="yes"]That sneaky puppy! [/headline] We have some serious suspicions that this little fellow has eaten the page you were looking for! Don't worry though.. A team of highly trained WordPress developers and top Web Designers are already chasing it furiously around the yard. Sooner or later it will be caught and you'll get your content! Until then why don't you have a look around if you're not interested in some other content? [/two_thirds] [/row] [divider] [row] [one_full] [section_headline tag="h4" lined="yes" color="color2"]Recent portfolio projects[/section_headline] [portfolio category="" order="DESC" navigation="no" pagination="no" view_all="no" height="" per_page="3" columns="3" masonry="no"] [section_headline tag="h4" lined="yes" color="color2"]Recent blog posts[/section_headline] [recent_posts category="" order="DESC" columns="4" count="8" show_title_icon="no" show_media="yes" show_date="yes" show_categories="no" show_author="no" show_tags="no" show_comments="no" slideshow="yes" animation="slide" navigation="yes" autoslide="no" interval=""] [/one_full] [/row]

item.title: Mark
item.dc:creator: minicorp_ishyoboy
item.content:encoded:
[divider]
[section_headline tag="h4" lined="yes" color="color2"]Default[/section_headline]
[row]
[one_fourth]
Sed lobortis neque ut sapien euismod quis [mark color=""]euismod[/mark] justo cursus. Mauris hendrerit iaculis quam, eu tincidunt metus pretium venenatis. Etiam viverra [mark color="color2"]consequat ante et commodo[/mark]. Nam sollicitudin dolor id nunc pharetra laoreet.
[divider]
[pre]... [[mark] ... [/mark]] ... [[mark color="color2"] ... [/mark]] ...[/pre]
[/one_fourth]
[one_fourth]
Nullam eleifend interdum porttitor. Aliquam erat volutpat. [mark color="color1"]Etiam malesuada tincidunt enim, nec egestas enim volutpat id.[/mark] Donec diam metus, interdum ac vestibulum sit amet, venenatis a ligula. Cras justo nibh, posuere at scelerisque in, aliquam ut diam.
[divider]
[pre]... [[mark color="color1"] ... [/mark]] ...[/pre]
[/one_fourth]
[one_fourth]
Curabitur vitae nunc nec dolor blandit venenatis. [mark color="color3"]Mauris ligula neque[/mark], egestas vitae porta at, vulputate sit amet erat. Nulla tempor elementum velit, sed accumsan nulla ornare at. Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada [mark color="color3"]fames ac turpis[/mark] egestas.
[divider]
[pre]... [[mark color="color3"] ... [/mark]] ...[/pre]
[/one_fourth]
[one_fourth]
Ut vel [mark color="color4"]libero eu sapien sodales[/mark] congue. Mauris euismod ligula ut odio feugiat sed condimentum turpis pharetra. Proin vestibulum, nisl eu fringilla faucibus, [mark color="color4"]sem sem faucibus orci[/mark], eu euismod lorem odio quis ligula.
[divider]
[pre]... [[mark color="color4"] ... [/mark]] ...[/pre]
[/one_fourth]
[/row]
[divider]
[section_headline tag="h4" lined="yes" color="color2"]Custom - Headline[/section_headline]
[row]
[headline tag="h1" color="color2"]My huge headline with [mark color="color1"]very important information[/mark] ...[/headline]
[divider]
[pre][[headline tag="h1" color="color2"] ... [mark color="color1"] ... [/mark] ... [/headline]][/pre]
[/row]
[divider]
[section_headline tag="h4" lined="yes" color="color2"]Custom - Inside iconic box[/section_headline]
[row]
[iconic_box icon="icon-globe" align="center"][headline tag="h2" color="color4"]Please [mark color="color1"]read this[/mark] very slowly[/headline][/iconic_box]
[divider]
[pre][[iconic_box icon="icon-globe" align="center"][headline tag="h2" color="color4"] ... [mark color="color1"] ... [/mark] ... [/headline][/iconic_box]][/pre]
[/row]
[divider]

item.title: Content & Page Break
item.dc:creator: minicorp_ishyoboy
item.content:encoded:
[content_break]
[section color="color2"]
[row]
[headline tag="div" lined="no" color="color1" align="center" css_class="h3"]Having all the content wrapped inside the main content area is great. But sometimes it is just more aesthetic to break out of the regular and bring the design to a new level.[/headline]
[/row]
[/section]
[/content_break]

[/row]

[headline tag="h2"]Use content break shortcode to create important sections on any page, give them background or pattern. You can even split your page content to more parts with page break shortcode.[/headline]

[headline tag="h2"]Tables are perfectly suitable for displaying structured data. Whether regular tables or more advanced pricing tables, Minicorp has them covered. Additional CSS classes make it super-easy for you to style the tables according to your design.[/headline]

item.title: Main Features
item.dc:creator: minicorp_ishyoboy
item.content:encoded:
[row id="responsive"] [divider] [divider] [headline tag="div" css_class="h1" color="color1" align="center"]Fully responsive[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2" align="center"]Minicorp is built on 12 columns fluid responsive grid system. You can be sure your site is perfectly displayed no matter what devices, platform, screen resolution, browser is used ...[/headline] [divider] [divider] [divider] [/row] [row id="woo-wpml"][/row] [content_break] [section color="color3"] [divider] [headline tag="div" css_class="h1" color="color1" align="center"]WooCommerce & WPML ready[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2" align="center"]Would you like to have an e-shop or multilingual page or blog? Not a problem. Minicorp's best friends are WooCommerce and WPML ...[/headline] [divider] [row] [grid3]

[/grid3] [grid1] [icon icon="icon-plus" size="36" align="center" color="color1" style="margin-top: 5px;"] [/grid1] [grid4]

[/grid4] [grid1] [icon icon="icon-plus" size="36" align="center" color="color1" style="margin-top: 10px;"] [/grid1] [grid3]

[/grid3] [/row] [divider] [/section] [section color="color1"] [row id="wp"] [divider] [row_nested1] [grid2 align="center" style="margin-top: 20px;"]

[/grid2] [grid10] [headline tag="div" css_class="h1" color="color4"]Wordpress 3.6 Fully Compatible[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2" color="color2"]Not only is Minicorp compatible with the latest version of WordPress but we have also made vast tests to ensure FULL compatibility with the hottest WordPress 3.6 version which is still under development and available only for developers.[/headline] [/grid10] [/row_nested1] [divider] [/row] [/section] [/content_break] [row id="shortcodes"] [divider] [divider] [headline tag="div" css_class="h1" color="color1" align="center"]Massive Shortcode Library[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2" align="center"]Minicorp comes with an outstanding set of more than 35 shortcodes available to help you assemble the content just in seconds. Whether you are a developer or a newbie you will be able to make thousands of combinations.[/headline] [divider] [/row] [row id="multiple-portfolios"][/row] [content_break] [section color="color3"] [divider] [headline tag="div" css_class="h1" color="color1" align="center"]Multiple Portfolios[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2" align="center"]Would you like to create multiple portfolios? Easy and quick as never before ... because Minicorp knows how ;)[/headline] [divider] [row_nested1] [grid6]

[/grid6] [grid6] [divider] [divider] [headline tag="div" css_class="h3" style="line-height: 35px;"]Multiple portfolios in Minicorp are presented by 1st level categories which can of course have sub-categories. After creating 1st level categories / portfolios simply use [mark color="color1"] portfolio [/mark] shortcode to call specific category / portfolio.[/headline] [divider] [divider] [headline tag="div" css_class="h3" style="line-height: 35px;"]In advance [mark color="color1"] portfolio [/mark] shortcode allows you to change the order of projects, show or hide portfolio categories navigation, pagination, "View all" button, define fixed height of screenshots or use masonry layout, set count of projects per page and columns of grid used for displaying projects ...[/headline] [/grid6] [/row_nested1] [divider] [/section] [/content_break] [row id="sliders-slidable"] [divider] [divider] [headline tag="div" css_class="h1" color="color1" align="center"]Sliders & Slidable[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2" color="color2" align="center"]Stunning set of sliders and slidable elements makes Minicorp the right choice for your content ... ... and you ;)[/headline] [divider] [divider] [divider] [/row] [row id="sidebars-widgets"][/row] [content_break] [section] [divider] [row_nested1] [headline tag="div" css_class="h1" color="color1" align="center"]Sidebars & Widgets[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2" align="center"]Minicorp upgrades regular sidebars & widgets to the next level. Try to imagine ...[/headline] [/row_nested1] [divider] [divider] [row_nested1] [grid3]

[/grid3] [grid5] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2" color="color1" style="margin-top: 20px;"]... 5 widget areas ...[/headline] [divider] [divider] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2" color="color1" align="right"]... unlimited sidebars ...[/headline] [/grid5] [grid4] [/grid4] [/row_nested1] [divider] [divider] [row_nested1] [grid6] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2" color="color1" align="center"]... global sidebars option in Theme Options ...[/headline] [/grid6] [/row_nested1] [row_nested1] [grid5 style="margin-top: 30px;"] [/grid5] [grid7 align="center"] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2" color="color1"]... per-page sidebar options ...[/headline] [/grid7] [/row_nested1] [row_nested1] [grid4] [/grid4] [grid8 style="margin-top: 15px;"] [divider] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2" color="color1"]... per-widget width option for all of 19 Minicorp widgets ...[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h3"]Why to be limited by fixed widget areas layout? Minicorp allows you to set custom width to each individual widget and create unlimited layout combinations. The choice is yours ...[/headline]

[/grid8] [/row_nested1] [row_nested1 style="margin-top: 15px;"] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2" align="center"]... now you don't have to imagine because Minicorp has all these.[/headline] [/row_nested1] [divider] [/section] [section color="color2"] [row id="styling"] [divider] [headline tag="div" css_class="h1" color="color1" align="center"]Advanced Styling Options[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2" align="center"]With Minicorp's styling option you can customize each detail of your page.[/headline] [divider] [divider] [/row] [/section] [section color="color3"] [row id="header-styles"] [divider] [headline tag="div" css_class="h1" color="color1" align="center"]Header Styles[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2" align="center"]Minicorp offers very effective and advanced options for the header so we are sure you will be able to create unlimited combinations of header styles. As usually the choice is just yours ;)[/headline] [divider]

[divider] [/row] [/section] [/content_break] [row id="page-lead"] [divider] [divider] [row_nested1] [grid7] [/grid7] [grid5] [divider] [headline tag="div" css_class="h1" color="color1"]Customizable Page Lead[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2"]Blow your visitors away right from the start![/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h3"]Show the most important message in the lead section, use any shortcodes, sliders, images ... ... create full content part, contact form, promo boxes, call to actions ... ... simply, you have unlimited possibilities of combinations ... [/headline] [/grid5] [/row_nested1] [divider] [divider] [/row] [content_break] [section color="color2"] [row id="nested-columns"] [divider] [row_nested1] [grid5]

[/grid5] [grid7 style="margin-top: 25px;"] [headline tag="div" css_class="h1" color="color1"]Nested Columns[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2"]Minicorp brings nested columns up to depth 3 - nested1, nested2, nested3.[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h3" style="line-height: 35px;"]Don't be limited by the default WordPress functionality which does not allow you to use a shortcode inside the same shortcode (nested shortcodes). Now you can create really complex layouts very easily and quickly. Want to see the nested columns in action?[/headline] [/grid7] [/row_nested1] [divider] [/row] [/section] [section color="color3"] [row id="support"] [divider] [headline tag="div" css_class="h1" color="color1" align="center"]5 Star Support[/headline] [row_nested1] [one_full align="center"] [icon icon="icon-star" size="36" color="color4"][icon icon="icon-star" size="36" color="color4"][icon icon="icon-star" size="36" color="color4"][icon icon="icon-star" size="36" color="color4"][icon icon="icon-star" size="36" color="color4"] [/one_full] [/row_nested1] [divider] [row_nested1] [grid2][/grid2] [grid8] [slidable autoslide="yes" animation="fade" interval="5" navigation="no"] [slide][headline tag="div" css_class="h2" color="color2" align="center"]Based on our previous customer's experiences and feed-backs we can guarantee the best 5 star support.[/headline][/slide] [slide] [quote color="color2"]EXCELLENT SUPPORT, REALLY! I had a little bug, ishyoboy quickly helped me and changed complex php files so the problems could be resolved. I REPEAT, VERY VERY GOOD SUPPORT!!![author]vipdorian[/author][/quote] [/slide] [slide] [quote color="color2"]Thank you so much for the prompt reply, fantastic customer service! [author]Al[/author][/quote] [/slide] [slide] [quote color="color2"]I’ve been using Themeforest for years and have bought MANY themes. That was the quickest support I have ever received from a developer!![author]Scott[/author][/quote] [/slide] [slide] [quote color="color2"]Thanks so much. You guys are really outstanding in every area – and that is so rare to find. [author]Dan[/author][/quote] [/slide] [divider] [/slidable] [/grid8] [grid2][/grid2] [/row_nested1] [divider] [/section] [/content_break] [row id="icons"] [divider] [divider] [headline tag="div" css_class="h1" color="color1" align="center"]1000+ retina ready icons[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2" align="center"]Use any of 1000+ Fontello retina ready icons included in Minicorp theme.[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h3" align="center"]Make your buttons, boxes and headlines eye-catching, use icons for creating individual content like social networks widget, change their color, size, make them clickable, square, circle ...[/headline] [divider] [row_nested1] [grid12 align="center"] [icon icon="icon-install" size="60" color="color2"][icon icon="icon-gift" size="45" color="color1" url="fontello-icons/"][icon type="circle" icon="icon-headphones" size="60" color="color3"][icon icon="icon-thumbs-up" size="35" color="color1"][icon type="square" icon="icon-camera-alt" size="45" color="color2" url="fontello-icons/"][icon icon="icon-shop" size="40" color="color1"][icon type="circle" icon="icon-leaf" size="50" color="color3" url="fontello-icons/"][icon icon="icon-bag" size="45" color="color2"] [/grid12] [/row_nested1] [divider] [divider] [/row] [row id="theme-options"][/row] [content_break] [section] [divider] [headline tag="div" css_class="h1" color="color1" align="center"]Minicorp Theme Options[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2" align="center"]Minicorp comes with an extensive Theme Options.[/headline] [divider] [row_nested1] [grid7] [/grid7] [grid4] [divider] [divider] [headline tag="div" css_class="h3" style="line-height: 35px;"]You can set whatever you can imagine from basic things as uploading your logo, favicon, custom CSS code or custom tracking code to advanced features such as setting your own 404 error page, customizing your header, footer, portfolio, blog and styling theme including colors, patterns, fonts ... and a lot more. Just have a look at screenshots from Minicorp Theme Options.[/headline] [/grid4] [/row_nested1] [divider] [/section] [section color="color2"] [row id="options-demo"] [divider] [row_nested1] [grid2 align="center"] [icon icon="icon-tools" size="86" color="color1"] [icon icon="icon-plus" size="52" color="color4" style="margin-top: 15px;"] [icon icon="icon-suitcase-1" size="86" color="color1"] [/grid2] [grid10] [headline tag="div" css_class="h1" color="color1"]Theme Options backup + Demo Content included[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2"]No needed to set up the whole theme and create all pages from scratch. Minicorp includes Theme Options and all the demo content that can be seen on the live version.[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h3"]Simply import the Theme Options and to create the content just copy the page you like and make small changes. It cannot be easier ;)[/headline] [/grid10] [/row_nested1] [divider] [/row] [/section] [/content_break]   [row id="theme-updates"] [divider] [divider] [row_nested1] [grid6 style="margin-top: 30px;"] [headline tag="div" css_class="h1" color="color1" align="right"]Minicorp Theme Updates[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2" align="right"]Minicorp updates checker allows you to be automatically notified when there is a new Minicorp theme update available.[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h3" align="right"]You can even go through the included changelog and see what changes have been done ...[/headline] [/grid6] [grid6] [/grid6] [/row_nested1] [divider] [divider] [/row] [row id="error404"][/row] [content_break] [section] [divider] [row_nested1] [grid1][/grid1] [grid6 align="right" style="margin-top: 20px;"] [headline tag="div" css_class="h1" color="color1"]Custom 404 error page[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2"]Bored of ugly and non-creative 404 error pages?[/headline] [headline tag="div" css_class="h3"]Minicorp allows you to create a regular page with help of all available shortcodes and to set it as the 404 error page ...[/headline] [/grid6] [grid4] [/grid4] [grid1][/grid1] [/row_nested1] [divider] [/section] [/content_break]

item.title: Tooltip
item.dc:creator: minicorp_ishyoboy
item.content:encoded:
[section_headline tag="h4" lined="yes" color="color2"]Tooltips in text[/section_headline]
[row]
[one_half]
Minicorp comes with an [tooltip color="color1" tooltip="And we mean it!"]outstanding[/tooltip] set of more than [tooltip color="color1" tooltip="Just navigate to the shortcodes page to explore them all "]30 shortcodes[/tooltip] available to help you assemble the content just in seconds. Whether you are a developer or a newbie you will be able to make thousands of [tooltip color="color1" tooltip="E.g.: color combinations" tooltip_color="color1"]combinations[/tooltip].
There's no needed to set up the whole theme and create all your pages [tooltip color="color2" tooltip="Too time consuming." tooltip_color="color3"]from scratch[/tooltip]. Minicorp includes Theme Options and all the [tooltip color="color2" tooltip="Simply import it!"]demo content[/tooltip] that can be seen on the live version. Simply import the Theme Options and to create the content just copy a page you like and make small changes. It cannot be easier!
[/one_half]

item.title: Home - Ishyoboy Slider
item.dc:creator: minicorp_ishyoboy
item.content:encoded:
[divider] [row] [one_third] [headline icon="icon-brush-1" lined="no" tag="h4" color="color2" first="no"]Fresh, Clean & Modern Design[/headline] Minicorp comes with fresh, clean and modern design which suits perfectly almost any kind of page. You can use it as a Corporate, Personal, Creative or Product portfolio, but we are sure you will find much more ways to use it for your own projects. [button url="http://themes.ishyoboy.com/minicorp/wp/main-features/" size="small" color="color1" new_window="no" align="left"]Explore the theme[/button] [/one_third] [one_third] [headline icon="icon-html5" lined="no" tag="h4" color="color2" first="no"]HTML5, CSS3, jQuery[/headline] Minicorp has been cooked with attention to new web design and  development trends. The main ingredients are HTML5 & CSS3 with a little bit of jQuery spice on top of it, for eye-catching effects. Bon Appétit... [button url="http://themes.ishyoboy.com/minicorp/wp/main-features/" size="small" color="color1" new_window="no" align="left"]Look under the hood[/button] [/one_third] [one_third] [headline icon="icon-mobile" lined="no" tag="h4" color="color2" ]Fully Responsive[/headline] Use almost any kind of platform. Mobile, Tablet, E-Reader, Desktop, PC or Mac to view Minicorp and it will perfectly adjust to it. Minicorp makes sure  to provide the perfect user experience, no matter what device or platform is being used. [button url="http://themes.ishyoboy.com/minicorp/wp/main-features/" size="small" color="color1" new_window="no" align="left"]View all main featurs[/button] [/one_third] [/row] [separator] [row] [one_third] [tabs_navigation pair="homepage-tabs" vertical="yes" color="color3"] [tab_title pair="tab1" active="yes"]Google Maps[/tab_title] [tab_title pair="tab9"]Minicorp[/tab_title] [tab_title pair="tab8"]SEO[/tab_title] [tab_title pair="tab2"]Latest Blog posts[/tab_title] [tab_title pair="tab3"]Latest Portfolio items[/tab_title] [tab_title pair="tab4"]Video content[/tab_title] [tab_title pair="tab5"]Timeline[/tab_title] [tab_title pair="tab6"]Top Support[/tab_title] [tab_title pair="tab7"]Skills bars[/tab_title] [/tabs_navigation] [/one_third] [two_thirds] [tabs_content pair="homepage-tabs"] [tab_content pair="tab1"] [map lat_lng_1="36.509, -4.886" zoom="11" height="288"] [/tab_content] [tab_content pair="tab9"] Minicorp is built on 12 columns fluid responsive grid system. You can be sure your site is perfectly displayed no matter what devices, platform, screen resolution or browser is used. Don’t be limited by the default WordPress functionality which does not allow you to use a shortcode inside the same shortcode (nested shortcodes). See the them in action? [headline tag="div" css_class="h3" color="color1"]Outstanding set of shortcodes[/headline] On top of that, Minicorp comes with an absolutely outstanding set of more than 35 shortcodes available to help you assemble the content just in seconds. Whether you are a developer or a newbie you will be able to make thousands of combinations using the basic configuration or the advanced shortcode attributes. [headline tag="div" css_class="h3" color="color1"]Advanced Theme Options[/headline] You can set everything you can imagine from basic things like uploading your logo, favicon, custom CSS code or custom tracking code to advanced features such as setting your own 404 error page, customizing your header, footer, portfolio, blog and styling theme including colors, patterns, fonts … and a lot more. Explore the screenshots from Minicorp Theme Options. [/tab_content] [tab_content pair="tab8"] [headline tag="div" css_class="h3" color="color1"]SEO - Search Engine Optimization[/headline] Minicorp is built using the latest SEO best practices in mind. Your content can be easily indexed by search engines as every part of the page is made using valid and semantic HTML5 markup. The order of your content is very important for search engines. Minicopr always places the important content before less important in the source code to signalize its importance to the search engines. Headlines are always wrapped in the (H1, H2, H3, ...) HTML headline tags which also increases SEO score. The used heavy internal linking is also of great importance. Minicorp provides breadcrumbs options, navigation menus and many content shordcodes to help you link your pages togeter. With Minicorp WordPress Theme you are perfectly equipped to get very high Google ranking and top positions in search results. It also plays well with the best SEO WordPress Plugins! [/tab_content] [tab_content pair="tab2" active="yes"] [recent_posts order="DESC" columns="2" count="2" show_title_icon="no" show_media="yes" show_date="yes" show_categories="yes" show_author="no" show_tags="no" show_comments="no" slideshow="no" animation="slide" navigation="yes" autoslide="no" interval=""] [/tab_content] [tab_content pair="tab3"] [portfolio category="" order="DESC" navigation="no" pagination="no" view_all="no" height="" per_page="2" columns="3" masonry="no"] [/tab_content] [tab_content pair="tab4"] [embed]http://vimeo.com/32238183[/embed] [/tab_content] [tab_content pair="tab5"] [timeline hover_effect="no"] [timeline_item size="big"] [timeline_content][headline tag="div" color="color1" css_class="h2"]Going live![/headline][/timeline_content] [timeline_date]23. APR[/timeline_date] [/timeline_item] [timeline_item size="medium"] [timeline_date]29. APR[/timeline_date] [timeline_content border="yes" color="color2"]Final documentation and server set up.[/timeline_content] [/timeline_item] [timeline_item size="small"] [timeline_content border="yes" color="color1"]Revisions and final functionality test are done.[/timeline_content] [timeline_date]28. APR[/timeline_date] [/timeline_item] [timeline_item size="small"] [timeline_date]25. APR[/timeline_date] [timeline_content][headline tag="div" color="color2" css_class="h2"]First drafts approved[/headline][/timeline_content] [/timeline_item] [/timeline] [/tab_content] [tab_content pair="tab6"] [box_group] [one_half] [iconic_box icon="icon-award" color="color1" align="center"] [headline tag="h2"]35+ Shortcodes[/headline] Minicorp comes with an outstanding set of shortcodes available to help you assemble the content just in seconds. Whether you are a developer or a newbie you will be able to make thousands of combinations. [button url="http://themes.ishyoboy.com/minicorp/wp/shortcodes/" size="small" color="color2" new_window="yes"]View shortcodes![/button] [/iconic_box] [/one_half] [one_half] [iconic_box icon="icon-star" color="color2" align="center"] [headline tag="h2" color="color4"]5 star support[/headline] No matter how experienced you are, there are times when a helping hand could come in handy. That's when we step in to cover your back! [button url="http://themeforest.net/user/IshYoBoy/portfolio?ref=IshYoBoy" size="small" color="color1" new_window="yes"]Help me![/button] [/iconic_box] [/one_half] [/box_group] [/tab_content] [tab_content pair="tab7"] [skills color="color2"] [skill percent="88" outside="no"]Unlimited color combinations[/skill] [skill percent="41" outside="no"]Responsive[/skill] [skill percent="65" outside="no"]Multiple portfolios[/skill] [skill percent="95" outside="no"]Mind-blowing shortcodes set[/skill] [skill percent="75" outside="no"]Unlimited Sidebars[/skill] [skill percent="38" outside="no"]Retina ready[/skill] [skill percent="82" outside="no"]Theme updates checker[/skill] [/skills] [/tab_content] [/tabs_content] [/two_thirds] [/row] [divider] [content_break] [section] [slidable autoslide="yes" animation="slide" interval="6" navigation="yes"] [slide] [row] [one_sixth]

item.title: User Reviews
item.dc:creator: minicorp_ishyoboy
item.content:encoded: [page_break style="padding: 20px 0;"][/page_break] [content_break] [section color="color2"] [row] [grid9] [headline tag="div" css_class="h2" color="color1" align="left"]Showcase your new webpage to the world![/headline] [headline tag="p" css_class="h5" color="color4" align="left"]If you are happy with your brand new Minicorp WP webpage, send us a back-link and we will add you to our Showcase section.[/headline] [/grid9] [grid3] [slidable autoslide="yes" animation="fade" interval="2" navigation="no"] [slide] [button url="http://themeforest.net/user/IshYoBoy?ref=IshYoBoy#contact" size="big" color="color1" new_window="yes" full_width="yes" align="center"]Send your link [icon icon="icon-forward"][/button] [/slide] [slide] [button url="http://themeforest.net/user/IshYoBoy?ref=IshYoBoy#contact" size="big" color="color2" new_window="yes" full_width="yes" align="center"]Send your link [icon icon="icon-forward"][/button] [/slide] [/slidable] [/grid3] [/row] [/section] [/content_break] [page_break style="padding: 20px 0;"][/page_break] [divider] [row] [grid12] [quote color="color3" boxed="yes"]This is one hell of an amazing theme, probably the best I've worked with and beats Opencart themes hands down. Its so adaptable to change yet 100% professional in every way.[author]James[/author][/quote] [/grid12] [/row] [divider] [row] [grid6] [quote color="color1" boxed="yes"]In all the world you have just received my all time favourite Developer award! You are quick to support irregardless of how busy you are, you never consider anything trivial and as always you disregard the level of experience of the user and give solutions that anyone will be able to follow! I am guaranteed to be buying your future templates![author]Gerhardus[/author][/quote] [/grid6] [grid6] [quote color="color1" boxed="yes"]Just need to say that you REALLY provide 5 star support!!! I’m loving your Theme more and more as I get to know it… and standard WP stuff since this is all new to me! Have looked and tested hundreds of Themes since I wanted an easy and fully adjustable one. Yours do all this and much more! OUTSTANDING! [author]Geriksen[/author][/quote] [/grid6] [/row] [divider] [row] [grid12] [quote color="color2" boxed="yes"]Hi, I just finished upgrading my web site that I originally built using rapidweaver to the wordpress version using this theme. I just can’t tell you how much I love your theme! The process was effortless, even if I never used wordpress before. Great documentation and support on your end! I even managed to make my site multilingual using the suggested WPML plugin in a matter of just half a day. Keep up the awesome work guys! BTW, of course I already 5starred minicorp[author]iachia[/author][/quote] [/grid12] [/row] [divider] [row] [grid6] [quote color="color3" boxed="yes"]What a wonderful theme you have created! It really is an achievement! I must have looked at over a 1000 themes in the last few days, and this hit everything we’re looking for.[author]Aforkes[/author][/quote] [/grid6] [grid6] [quote color="color3" boxed="yes"]Thank you for making such a user-friendly product. I am new to WP and am thankful someone created a theme that has allowed me to make a webpage as a novice.[author]Ddameron[/author][/quote] [/grid6] [/row] [divider] [row] [grid12] [quote color="color1" boxed="yes"]Hey! Firstly you rock! Secondly, because you rock so much, you have designed two awesome templates for WordPress… Which makes my life extremely difficult. I’ve gone through all the templates available here on themeforest and Minicorp and Creolio are the ones that i desire…[author]Phoenixcreations[/author][/quote] [/grid12] [/row] [divider] [row] [grid4] [quote color="color2" boxed="yes"]Hi, your minicorp theme is really great.[author]Iachia[/author][/quote] [/grid4] [grid4] [quote color="color2" boxed="yes"]I know how hard you guys are working and your support appears to be second to none. You guys are doing a great job.[author]Gareth[/author][/quote] [/grid4] [grid4] [quote color="color2" boxed="yes"]Thanks for a great theme![author]Glenn[/author][/quote] [/grid4] [/row] [divider] [row] [grid12] [quote color="color1" boxed="yes"]Want to start by saying that I LOVE your theme. Very very nice. Great work!! I never thought that I could implement a full blown website using just Wordpress, but seeing this theme, I know it can be done  Thanks a lot for the great work.[author]Ggaurav[/author][/quote] [/grid12] [/row] [divider] [row] [grid6] [quote color="color3" boxed="yes"]I recently bought the Minicorp theme for WP. It’s really amazing and one of the best themes I bought so far on Themeforest – great work![author]Morecoffee[/author][/quote] [/grid6] [grid6] [quote color="color3" boxed="yes"]I’m you 13th Minicorp buyer! I’ve spent some serious time looking at themes on themeforest and yours covers all the bases. Finding Minicorp yesterday must have been fate. Love it! Nicely done.[author]Bugbee[/author][/quote] [/grid6] [/row] [divider] [page_break style="padding: 20px 0;"][/page_break] [content_break] [section color="color2" full_width="no" pattern="yes" pattern_url=""] [headline tag="div" css_class="h1" color="color1" align="center"]Thank You![/headline] [/section] [/content_break] [page_break style="padding: 20px 0;"][/page_break]
